text: Hi, I'm Francis,
the host of this show "Cooking with Dog."
Let's make the Healthy Black Sesame Smoothie.
Peel the banana,
divide it in half and place it into the blender.
Add the soymilk,
a nutritious, anti-aging soybean product.
You can substitute regular milk if you like.
Add the ground black sesame seeds,
which have both dietary and anti-aging benefits.
Add honey to taste.
Finally, drop in about 3 to 4 ice cubes,
cover with a lid
and turn on the blender.
When the banana is completely blended, it is ready to serve.
Remove the glass pitcher from the blender and pour the smoothie into a glass.
Bananas are rich in nutrients, dietary fibers and antioxidants,
which help boost your immune system.
Soymilk contains high quality proteins and fats and it is good for dieting.
In addition, the sesame seeds will help in maintaining your beautiful skin.
The ingredients are easily digested so this is also recommended for children and elderly people.
Good luck in the kitchen!
